data.title: Celebrity Family Feud 2018 Contestants Include Kanye West, Kim Kardashian West and More!
meta_keywords: Celebrity Family Feud 2018 Contestants Include Kanye West
data.meta_description: Find out which celebrities and their families will join host Steve Harvey on season four of Celebrity Family Feud!
data.text:
Get ready for another hilarious season of Celebrity Family Feud when the game show returns SUNDAY, JUNE 10 at 8|7c on ABC! Stars joining host Steve Harvey for the fourth season of Celebrity Family Feud include Team Kardashian vs. Team West, Stephen Curry vs. Chris Paul, Ice T and Coco vs. Vivica A. Fox, Tori Spelling and Dean McDermott vs. Amber Riley, Team NBA on TNT vs. Team MLB All-Stars, and Laurie Hernandez vs. Shawn Johnson, amongst others. Also this season will see some intense thematic match-ups like Team Grey's Anatomy vs. Team Station 19 and the NFL Rookies vs. the NFL Veterans. See the full list of celebrity contestants below and watch all of Sunday Fun & Games starting with Celebrity Family Feud at 8|7c, followed by The $100,000 Pyramid (hosted by Michael Strahan) and To Tell the Truth (hosted by Anthony Anderson).
